column1: NGR is from the 1940s record and is near Hafod Yr Onnen. Stated altitude 50 ft too low. A new gauge was installed in the 1940s at the same stated altitude but has a different NGR 350 NW actually at Hafod yr Onnen. I think the new and old gauge are in the same poition but the fact that the new gauge has a different station number suggests otherwise hence different NGRs used.
